name: Chocolate Mousse Cake IV
author: Stephanie
summary: Chocolate cake with chocolate mousse filling. Everyone will think you bought it at a bakery!
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Prepare and bake cake mix according to package directions for two 9-inch layers
In a large bowl, mix together sweetened condensed milk and melted chocolate
Gradually stir in the water, then instant pudding until smooth
Remove the chocolate mixture from the refrigerator, and stir to loosen
Fold in whipped cream and return to the refrigerator for at least another hour
Place one layer of cake onto a serving plate
Top with 1 1/2 cups of the mousse, then cover with the remaining cake layer
Frost with the remaining mousse, and refrigerate until serving
Garnish with fresh fruit or chocolate shavings
